16.story: Starbucks Singapore updated their cover photo.

comments.message: I can think of many other outlets I'd rather see closed than one at a hospital where people need it. Bad move.

Dear Starbucks TTSH, i will miss you. For the past 30+ days, my mother has been warded in TTSH and almost everyday, i would grab a drink at this outlet. It would be my 15 mins of peace before i go back into the ward to face the harsh reality of a seriously ill mother. On 10 May, Starbucks TTSH will cease operations, but i will still be hanging out at TTSH. Thank you for the moments, it is a place filled with memories, tears and many silent prayers for her recovery. You will be missed.
why?!~ Its one of the most comforting place in the hospital for the weary..

Pity to hear that Starbucks will cease brewing at TTSH. Similar to Dennis, the store was my hide-out for some self time before heading back to grandma's bedside some months back. With her in-s and out-s of TTSH throughout her final 6 months, I've gotten to know some really great Starbucks ambassadors - Huang Hui, Naomi & Ronnie. Was back last month to accompany Mum to TTSH & deliberately walked past the store but didn't spot any familiar faces. Never did I realize that'll be my last visit. 

Nonetheless, hope to meet the familiar faces in other stores such as Millenia Walk, Suntec & Ion Orchard where I frequent ^^v
TTSH  PLEASE LET STARBUCKS STAY...♡
Then how the medical workers keep awake? Have Starbucks Singapore thought of the dire consequences of such a rash decision? U-turn while real damage is not done!
Awwww will definetly miss u peeps!!! U guys always perks up my days, the most friendly, kind lots of ppl!!!
Oh no why? :( Starbucks at TTSH was a convenient way for brightening up one's day!
Thanks Starbucks TTSH for cheering me up during my tenure at TTSH. All the best at the greener pasture
Ya man... a great place for the weary patients' visitors
Thank you starbucks ttsh for such a memorable experience whenever i go there. I will miss your....
No way... I will miss starbucks..
It's a damn sad news & so last min... :(
This is sad... Anyways, thank you for being the most comfy place there to chill with my coffee before my usual medical appts...
So sad. Starbucks at ttsh always provide the sanity I needed whenever I'm there
M gonna miss my daily caramel macchiato :(((( so sad .... Gonna miss u
We will miss u all too!! T.T
I will miss you too!! You're like my very own shadow!  I grew up while you brewed for past 14 years!!
Will miss my Starbucks friends  at TTSH... * Zack Valet*
I'll miss you guys... Bee drinking there for many years...
Thank you for being there when I needed you, a familiar enclave I can seek respite in a cold, sterile, saddening environment.
Alicia Koh Fidahdah Tebabom Zain Hashim Chris Hwang Ronnie Carson Carol Tang ):
Nariko Zhang

17.post_text:
We're winding down our store at Tan Tock Seng Hospital on 10 May. 

Thank you to all the doctors, nurses, patients and friends who have stuck it out with us. You will be missed.

comments.message:
Hey Sunita Said, Stanley Yeo and Janna See, 

We totally understand your frustrations with the limited seating in stores. Please do approach our barista and store manager to have them help you find seats if and when you have trouble doing so.

They would love to help you with that. :)
dont go starbucks until june... went over to a few starbucks yesterday but all were filled with students hoarding desks!! some don't even have drinks on their tables anymore..
Isn't this exactly like tokomo shintani on Instagram?

I HATE IT when STUDENTS HOG the tables....WTF.they leave the book n go somewhere else with girlfriend after that........they scared later cant find table.wherelse other customer all we could do is respect them n leave their books n table alone! why do we have to respect their books? we are humans we need to sit down NOT the BOOKS.humans get tired NOT books! THE next time I see books on table.n gonna kindly take the book to the Cashier n said " I FOUND these books lying around" OR we could just take their chairs n leave their books on the table..and whats up hogging the tables n chairs all day? NO HOUSE??

I think they shld study somewhere else. Alot of them buy 1 drink n there were 4 of them but sat for hours!!! In Terminal 2 outlet was horrible yesterday. There were lots of students studying (even brought home food n ate there) n travellers who were waiting to check in couldnt get a seat to drink while waiting for their flight. Ignorant "students"!
... Nice. Its no wonder why some ppl hog tables with their laptops for hours.

I agree wif u Richard. Im a HUGE fan of starbucks. I will drink n eat there almost everyday but sometimes it pisses me off coz they hog the tables for hours n all they do is watch youtube or play games on their hp while their books on the tables. :(
